HERO.DESCRIPTION: Log your weigh-ins and workouts with ease. Stay consistent and achieve your fitness goals.

ABOUT.TITLE: About KeepItUp
ABOUT.MISSION_DESCRIPTION: Helping you stay consistent and track your progress towards achieving a healthier you.
ABOUT.TOOLS_DESCRIPTION: Easy-to-use tools for logging weigh-ins, tracking workouts, and staying motivated.

FEATURES.TITLE: Features
FEATURES.LOG_WEIGH_INS_DESCRIPTION: Track your weight every week to monitor your progress over time.
FEATURES.LOG_WORKOUTS_DESCRIPTION: Record your exercises and track your fitness routine effortlessly.

CONTACT.TITLE: Contact Us
CONTACT.DESCRIPTION: Have questions or need support? We're here to help! Connect with us:

CTA.TITLE: Start Your Journey Today
CTA.DESCRIPTION: Sign up for free and take the first step towards a healthier you.
